name: Gouki The Tyrant Ogre
text:
1 "Gouki" Link Monster + 1 Warrior, Dinosaur, or Cyberse monster
If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can target cards on the field, up to the total Link Rating of the "Gouki" Link Monsters used as material; destroy them. If you used a Link-3 or higher monster as material, neither player can activate those cards or their effects in response to this effect's activation. You can only use this effect of "Gouki The Tyrant Ogre" once per turn. If this card battles, your opponent cannot activate card or effects until the end of the Damage Step.
